attributes.action: End free movement of people immediately after March 29th 2019
attributes.additional_details: End freedom of movement of people at 11pm March 29 2019.
attributes.background:
On June 23 2016, the people voted to leave the EU.
They voted to end freedom of movement of people to come to the UK.
They did not vote for a transitional period which could extend freedom of movement until 2021.
We call upon the Government to implement the will of the people.
